name: Load Zone 1
description:
Load Zone consists of 10 small platformer levels challenging the player with basic movement mechanics. Collect the diamond at a location inside of the level to advance to the next zone. Are you able to complete all ten zones and collect all of the diamonds!

This game was made over the course of five days! If you enjoyed playing please consider leaving your feedback in the comments. Keep an eye out for a coming Load Zone sequel!

Credit:

  • 2D Mega Pack | Brackeys
  • 2D Flexible Platformer Controller | Yan
  • Playmaker
  • Water Float | Pathiral
  • "Another Version of You" | Chris Zabriskie
